author: Nathan
description: Provides strategic guidance for adventure encounters based on enemy attributes
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store any user data.
install_msg: Thank you for installing AdventureHelper! Make sure you're running the latest version of adventure from https://github.com/aikaterna/gobcog. Use `[p]adventurehelper toggle` to enable/disable the helper in your server.
name: AdventureHelper
